Pro.BlockAddIns: [0 (Default All Addins Allowed), 1 (Signed by CA), 2 (Esri Addins Only), 3 (Esri Addins Only from Admin Folder), 4 (No Addins Allowed), 5 (Only Addins from Admin Folder)]
Pro.EnableEUEI: [ True (Default enables participation of Esri User Experience Improvement Program) | False]
Pro.CheckForUpdatesAtStartup: [ True (Default enables automatic update notifications of ArcGIS Pro) | False ]
